item.description:
*** LOCATION HAS CHANGED ***

This will be the very first Meetup for The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group!
We'll use the time to get to know each other, and show a little of what we each do best.

This meeting will be held concurrently with the Boston Graphic Design Meetup. See http://graphicdesign....

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Digital Arts November Meetup
